text.text: One of the beautiful temples in Singapore. Al the sculptures are designed beautifully giving an authentic appeal. The internal lighting are so perfectly installed giving a divine look for all the sculptures.

originalText.text: One of the beautiful temples in Singapore. Al the sculptures are designed beautifully giving an authentic appeal. The internal lighting are so perfectly installed giving a divine look for all the sculptures.

text.text:
I just want to share my experience on the consecration day which was happening recently. The day i visited temple, i felt that the arrangements were not so good and satisfying. reason, when i step in to temple there were even no deepam Aarathana, which is very common in Hindu temples.
After the temple visit was guided to walk to Ananthanam venue, where i reached was told everyone that, all got over and no more Annathanam at even around 11 am. This was on the consecration day and some more on sunday, which usually most people try to visit temple. I am not here complaining, just i am registering my feedback based on my experience as a devotee. Even i heard the same words from others in the crowd.

I hope the management look at my review and improve the arrangements for the upcoming events.

text.text:
This recently consecrated Temple is really Divine with pleasant color combinations of Golden and white.
This is the only Temple in Singapore ( in fact only few places in the world ) has this combination of Shiva & Krishna in one statue and in front of it have separate nandhi and garudar side by side which is ultimately a rare combination to see..
The temple entrance also has Big standing  Nandhi statue & Hanuman..

I was lucky enough to attend the consecration of this temple.

Pls visit this temple & get the Divine blessings of Shiva & Krishna together üôè

text.text: Beautiful temple with all major Indian Hindu God and goddesses present. The temple is very well maintained and is in close distance from woodland interchange. The Nadaswaram player played purvikalyani and shanmugapriya when we went there and it transferred us to a different world . All kudos to the management for maintaining agama shastra.

The Nadaswaram player played purvikalyani and shanmugapriya when we went there and it transferred us to a different world . All kudos to the management for maintaining agama shastra.

text.text: Temple is closed for renovations. From the banner that I saw, renovation works will finish only in 2025. Meanwhile, devotees can still do prayers at the temporary area beside the temple. Can't wait to see the newly done interior of the temple!
